testcase.name: Invite Vendor with Valid Input Data for HeaderTab,ColourTab
testcase.system-out: Given Login Dss+ Application with Valid User Details........................passed When User is on Home Page Click on New Item Tab and Click Create New Item...passed And Enter the Required Field Values for "zzDummyAutoTestItem" "Test" "Test" "07/10/2019" "Generic" "Winter" "2019" "Test" "Apparel Consolidation" "EACH" "991 - APPAREL DUMMY DEPT" "Private" "ADVANCE" "Fashion Line"in Header Tab and Click Save.passed And Enter the Required Field Values for Colour Tab..........................passed And Enter the Required Field Values for Requirement Tab.....................passed And Enter the Required Field Values for Specification Tab...................passed Then The Values Should be Saved Successfully................................passed

testcase.name: Invite Vendor without Mandatory Input Data for Department
testcase.system-out: Given Login Dss+ Application with Valid User Details........................passed When User is on Home Page Click on New Item Tab and Click Create New Item...passed And Enter the Required Field Values for "zzDummyAutoTestItem" "Test" "Test" "30/09/2019" "Generic" "Winter" "2019" "Test" "Apparel Consolidation" "EACH" "" "Private" "ADVANCE" "Fashion Line"in Header Tab and Click Save.passed Then The Warning Message Should be displayed Successfully as "Product Category: Mandatory field is missing.".passed
